challenges.title: Why product documentation falls short
challenges.subtitle: Most teams struggle with documentation that's either too sparse to be useful or too time-consuming to maintain.

challenge-1.title: Fragmented information
challenge-1.description: Requirements scattered across tools mean context switching, lost details, and teams working from outdated specs.

challenge-2.title: Variable standards
challenge-2.description: Without templates, each team member documents differently, making collaboration harder and onboarding slower.

challenge-3.title: Documentation burden
challenge-3.description: PMs spend more time documenting than discovering. Writing becomes a chore that delays shipping and reduces iteration speed.

faq.title: Common questions
faq.subtitle: Learn more about how PRDKit works

question-1.question: How long does it take to get started?
question-1.answer: Zero setup required. Create your account and start generating PRDs in under 60 seconds. No configuration, no onboarding calls, no training.

question-2.question: What happens to my product data?
question-2.answer: Your data stays yours. We encrypt everything, never train public models on your content, and you can export or delete your data anytime.

question-3.question: Is PRDKit suitable for teams of all sizes?
question-3.answer: Yes. Whether you're a solo founder or leading a 100-person product org, PRDKit scales with your needs. Unlimited team members on all paid plans.

question-4.question: How does PRDKit fit into our workflow?
question-4.answer: PRDKit exports to all major documentation tools (Notion, Confluence, Google Docs) and integrates with Slack. Your PRDs work wherever your team works.

question-5.question: Can the AI adapt to our product domain?
question-5.answer: Absolutely. PRDKit learns from your existing docs, website, and product screens to generate PRDs that match your domain, tone, and structure.
